thread.title: Saudis enjoy 'Black Panther' as cinema ban lifts

title: Saudis enjoy 'Black Panther' as cinema ban lifts
text:
Saudis enjoy 'Black Panther' as cinema ban lifts 12:30pm EDT - 01:27 
Saudi Arabia launches its first commercial movie theater, ending a 35-year ban on cinemas, under a push by the crown prince to modernize the deeply conservative Muslim kingdom. Michelle Hennessy reports.
